body: i'll defer to  @xvrl 'spatch

Refer to this link for build results (access rights to CI server needed): 
https://builds.apache.org/job/kafka-pr-jdk8-scala2.12/3588/
Test FAILed (JDK 8 and Scala 2.12).

I've rebased the PR on top of trunk. the rebased one is different from the original as underlying code has changed.
running locally i seem to be hitting test failures that are caused by trunk instability (they happen on vanilla trunk as of e71dce89c0da50f3eccc47d0fc050c92d5a99b88 as well), namely 
```
DescribeConsumerGroupTest. testDescribeGroupWithNewConsumerWithShortInitializationTimeout
RequestQuotaTest. testResponseThrottleTime
```

@apurvam @vahidhashemian - i just managed to get a build that got to streams (so all of core passed), KStreamsFineGrainedAutoResetIntegrationTest passed (build proceeded to deadlock a few minutes after though ...)
